title: Virtual Field Learning-Based Emergency Medical Services (EMS) Professional Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Project-based learning conducted in smartphone-centric limited technological environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain emergency medical system operating procedures with over 80% accuracy through virtual field trip (VFT) content
Learners can derive at least three core skills applicable to real-world response scenarios by analyzing simulation videos
Learners can achieve over 90% participation rates when performing role-plays using Uzbek/Russian voice-supported VFT materials during PBL team activities

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
